about_me:
Highly analytical and technically driven software engineer with hands-on experience in full-stack web development, databases, cloud infrastructure, and mobile applications. Skilled in designing and building responsive, user-friendly websites with clean, reusable code and interactive layouts.

When I’m not coding, you’ll likely find me skiing in the winter, playing video games, or riding motorcycles for the adrenaline rush. I also enjoy traveling, cooking, movies, and continuously learning new skills.
